edu.umkc.cs5573.isa

Class CyborgController

  • Object
    • edu.umkc.cs5573.isa.CyborgController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IWatchDirHandler

    public class CyborgController
extends Object
implements IWatchDirHandler

    The wrapper class of actual Cyborg Security logic process.

    It implements IWatchDirHandler so that the file change event will be handled here

    Author:
    Younghwan
    See Also:
    IWatchDirHandler
